page_content:
69  |  Community
2021 Community 
Highlights 
Peak Innovation Center 
ArcBest made a $1 million investment in the Peak Innovation 
Center  — a state-of-the-art career and technical education center 
that will be available to approximately 43,000 students from 22 
regional school districts in the Fort Smith, Arkansas, area. The 
center will allow career and college-bound students to develop 
real-world skills and earn industry-specific certifications in a 
variety of technical fields. ArcBest is proud to be a part of creating 
a pipeline of local talent to fill existing jobs and support further 
economic growth.
